refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o wgbrass.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1 0dbfs = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 kamp = 0.7 kfreq = p4 ktens = p5 iatt = p6 kvibf = p7 ifn = 1
; Create an amplitude envelope for the vibrato. kvamp line 0, p3, 0.5
a1 wgbrass kamp, kfreq, ktens, iatt, kvibf, kvamp, ifn out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Table #1, a sine wave. f 1 0 1024 10 1
; freq tens att vibf i 1 0 4 440 0.4 0.1 6.137 i 1 4 4 440 0.4 0.01 0.137 i 1 8 4 880 0.4 0.1 6.137 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
